Definitely a sweet looking craft. I love it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

That cockpit is a wonderful touch too.

> Definitely a sweet looking craft. I love it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Thanks.

i think i'm gonna re use that copit.
That cockpit > everything else in the world. Really though, that is one of the most innovative, pretty looking aircraft cockpits I've ever seen!

> 
> That cockpit > everything else in the world. Really though, that is one of the most innovative, pretty looking aircraft cockpits I've ever seen!

Thanks i really like it to
